item.title: 'We got smoked': Concerns for Freo, Eagles downplay win
item.description: Justin Longmuir said his team was comprehensively smashed in contests, while Adam Simpson lauded the performance of young star Harley Reid

item.title: Lions' den to petting zoo: Cracks appear in Gabba fortress
item.description: Brisbane was unbeatable at home last year but is winless there in 2024.

item.description: West Coast has won two games in a row for the first time since 2021 after sinking Fremantle in Western Derby 58

item.title: Top-of-the-table Cats sink limp Lions in the wet
item.description: Brisbane remains winless at the Gabba this year as they fail to handle Geelong or the slippery conditions

item.title: 'It's hard being Toby': Giants coach backs Greene, rues midfield display
item.description: Adam Kingsley says the Giants' midfield was "obliterated" by the Blues as he discussed Toby Greene's bump

item.title: JHF avoids major injury, 'another level' for Pies
item.description: Jason Horne-Francis has likely avoided serious injury after leaving the field during the Power's loss to Collingwood

item.description: The Blues have powered past the Giants in an impressive win

item.description: Collingwood has overcome a sluggish start to defeat Port Adelaide by 42 points

item.title: AFL concedes umpiring error made in Draper non-call
item.description: While saying it was the correct approach at the time, the AFL has admitted an umpiring error was made in not penalising Sam Draper for holding the ball on Friday night
